'''Beta 1.1_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Beta]], released on December 22, 2010,<ref>{{tweet|notch|17569425494376449|groooan, updated to 1.1_02, mandatory for client and server, fixing the container not opening with empty hands bug|December 22, 2010}}</ref> to fix a bug with [[chest]]s in [[Beta 1.1_01]]. This is the final version released in 2010.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed a bug where chests would not open if the player's hand was empty.
